text: Þis his norþ niwan tunes boc.
Aerest on Auene æt stintes forde þæt andlang weges on teoltan ford.
And swa ongean stream on wifeles ford.
Þonne andlang þæs friðherpaþes on sandbeorh.
Of þam beorge to botan wylle.
Þonne forð be streame on blacan lace.
<../images/tbar.gif>andlang lace on afene.
And swa andlang stremes eft on stintes ford.
Þis synt þa landgemære æt þam oran.
Ærest on hæsel wylle.
<../images/tbar.gif>andlang weges on beorh dic.
Þonne andlang þære dic on risþysel.
And swa west on butan on bradanstan.
Of þam stane on rugan dic.
Þonen on lusa beorg.
<../images/tbar.gif>andlang weges on readan sloh.
And swa to wodnes dic.
Þonne forð be þare dic on crypelgeat.
Þonne to dræg stane.
And swa to meos leage.
Of þare leage andlang oxna pæþes eft on hæsel wylle.
